laboratory_examinations.findings: Leukopenia with WBC count of 1100 cells/μL, lymphopenia with ALC of 1089 cells/μL, neutropenia with ANC of 11 cells/μL, normocytic anemia with Hb of 7.5 g/dL.
High inflammatory markers with ESR of 44 mm/hour.
Abnormal liver enzymes with AST of 178 IU/L and ALT of 110 IU/L.

Low T CD3+ (141 cells/μL), low T CD4+ (119 cells/μL), low T CD8+ (22 cells/μL), normal B CD19+ (555 cells/μL) and B CD20+ (544 cells/μL), normal NK CD16+CD56+ (272 cells/μL), low IgG (83 mg/dL), normal IgA (195 mg/dL), IgM (203 mg/dL), and IgE (0.2 IU/ml). Normal NBT test, low TREC, abnormal LTT to mitogens and antigens (PHA: 1.5, BCG: 2, Candida: 1.5).
